website_summaries.verdict: Not sturdy enough to handle large DSLR cameras, but it works nicely for smaller models at a great price.
pros: Extremely lightweight and portable tripod that’s easy to carry anywhere
Has a smooth pan head, so you can tilt and rotate the camera easily, especially for video
Extends to a maximum height of 55 inches
Offered at a reasonable price point
Rubber feet in the tripod will self-adjust to deal with surfaces that are slightly uneven
cons: Supports up 11 pounds of camera gear, but it will be wobbly if you approach that amount

customer_reviews.title: Nice tripod for such a price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to unfold and fold. Light weight, but same time stands pretty sturdy. Would be nice if there was more metal in it, but that way it would be more heavy so, yeah, not much to complain about that. And also I would say head moves much smoother than it usually moves on other tripods from such price category, that's quite impressive.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tripod to use with my Vortex Viper HD spotting scope. The tripod works perfectly and is light enough to pack along in my backpack on long packs searching for bulls... I recommend this tripod for hunters!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking tripod and works excellent
customer_reviews.text: One word “AMAZING”... i love this tripod, for the price you would think your getting some cheap tripod but your in for a shock. The tripod came in on a nice box and it had some weight to it considering the price. Inside the box there was the bag and inside the bag there was tripod cover in a clear bag, first impression that it was well packaged and the company knows how to deliver. The tripod feels really good and added my canon sl2 to it and it does the job. I’m impressed and I will definitely recommend this tripod to my fellow photographers and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jku4x4

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Friendly Tripid
customer_reviews.text: Used this tripod on our recent trip abroad and it worked well with the Nikon D3400. It was easy to set up and be ready to shoot, and breaks down just as quickly. We did not run into any issues with extended use. We needed something that was travel friendly and this fit into out travelpro 21" carry-on bags on the plane and into a larger backpack while on the streets of Paris. An inch or two shorter when collapsed would make packing it a bit easier but even as it stands, it did not cause us any issues. Highly recommend for the quality, function, and price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Great Quality Tripod.
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is great. It's made out of aluminum alloy with ABS plastic clamps, which feels sturdy. It's lightweight and has great build quality, which is great for long exposures. Also the swivel head is smooth, great for film. The base plate is good and the hook is a nice touch. Overall the ZOMEI Q111 (comes with a carrying case) is a great tripod for the price that I would definitely recommend to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I can do an overhead or birds-eye-view shot!
customer_reviews.text: My generic tripod I have been using since 2012 has finally broke. I purchased another generic one but it did not do what I wanted it to do, which is an overhead shot using my Iphone. I like how this tripod can tilt downwards. It feels sturdy, but it is light. I just got it today, but I am giving it 5 stars because it does what I want it to do. I looked at a ton of tripods here in Amazon, but just went with this one because I was spending too much time looking at Amazon. I am glad I just picked this one. I will update if it fails me, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Triplet Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically to mount a DR. J Professional HI-04 1080P Supported 4Inch Mini Projector on while watching movies outdoors. With such a cheap projector, I didn't want to spend much on a tripod to support it, and this fit the bill perfectly. Lots of adjustments, holds pretty stabile considering its light weight, and collapses down to a small enough size that it will fit inside a backpack. I'm not super confident how durable it will be over the years, but with my limited use it should serve its purpose for the next year.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick

customer_reviews.title: very light weight
customer_reviews.text: consider this to be an "entry level" tripod. very useful!!, but for more serious work, spend more, and you will get more. please do not think im trashing this product, im not, it works fine for the application. tripod extends to about 4 feet in height, tubes are light weight aluminum, rubber foot pads, all controls are plastic in construction and reasonably solid. camera mount is quick disconnect type so thats handy. as i said, it's very light weight, so vibration absorption is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Stability and Value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. For what it costs it is a great compromise between lighter (and significantly more expensive) carbon tripods, and less substantial aluminum models that are only slightly cheaper. I liked the leg locks, the center supports, the bag hanger and the quick release. I know pros and weight weenies would use a ball mount - I'm just not there yet. I like being able to control the pivot and pan. 55" height might be an issue for some, but the swivel screen on my Nikon covers that. We had a good time experimenting with astrophotography the first time out, and look forward to a number of hikes and trips with this.
customer_reviews.author: Flynbike

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact and durable tripod
customer_reviews.text: Just received this tripod but have yet to actually use it in the field. It is a very compact lightweight tripod to carry with its case. Good price for the quality. Easy to set up and attach the camera with its quick release. I think I will get a lot of good use from this durable tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Swick

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tripod.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid tripod. Other reviewers did not address the removable plate which I was concerned about since it can leave gaps and allow movement. This plate removes and reinstalls easily. There are small gaps which allows movement, but are easily eliminated with rubber bands or paper pieces. It's not loose but can be moved, only if I try, so it's not an issue except in extreme cases. A normal camera should not be a problem. All other aspects work great, including panning which has been a complaint with other tripods. The locks to prevent movement work very well in all places and it fits well into the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight  and stable
customer_reviews.text: Everything I want to keep my camera steady during close up photography. I also like the hook for additional stability if needed. Extremely portable with a nice carry case. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Derwin D Henley

customer_reviews.title: I love this very much
customer_reviews.text: I love this very much. I bought it because I needed to cut my hair by myself. I attached a webcam to it so that I could watch myself on the monitor. I always needed to move it around to see myself from different angles. It is of light weight so I'm totally not tired. Furthermore, it is very robust. I have used it for several months and it is still like new. If its quality is not good, its legs will be loose like my friend's tripod.
customer_reviews.author: abner

customer_reviews.title: Tripod is great design and value
customer_reviews.text: I like that is has a nice height for camera shots and very fluid head design. It is sturdy but lite weight for backpacking. Nice to have the camera bag so as not make our camera backpack standout as camera gear for security reasons. Our local camera store had like product for sale price of $90 but this product is every bit as good with less cost.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Dickmeyer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TRIPOD!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this tripod, from the leg latching to the removable camera mount. Also the mounting head will rotate vertically 90 degrees so my "Bloggie" can mount and take movies that I'm in for a change! Very nicely built. Cranks and legs operate smoothly. Carrying case is nicely made also. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to put this tripod through the ringer (backpacking in the mountains), but my initial impression is that this is made with sturdier metal and plastic than other tripods I've owned. I've tested it out already and am happy with the legs, adjustment options, and mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight beginner tripod
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this tripod for a little under a year now and I have very little complaints. It's stable enough and it gets the job done. I will say that some of the hardware does feel flimsy and a bit fragile, but you get what you pay for! I would not trust this tripod in extremely windy weather without a sandbag or some type of weight though, but otherwise it's great. Easy to use, quick to setup, and fairly intuitive to learn how to use efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Nicdao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tripod!!!
customer_reviews.text: It took a lot of researching for me to finally decide to buying a tripod. After finding a review on this one, I decided this was the one. After I received the package I realized this was even better than the reviews it had. It is very light weight but also very sturdy. I also ordered an attachment for the tripod for my phone. The functionality of this tripod is great and it allows me to capture a photo at all angles and directions. I bring this with me whenever I go outdoors and it was worth every dollar!! Very impressed with this tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Michael

customer_reviews.title: Happy So Far
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with this tripod. It's easy to set up and is fairly tall. Seems sturdy but I sometimes wonder about the durability of all the plastic pieces at the top. The foam grips were a nice touch and the quick release plate seems to work well. I also like the hook where you can hang a weight or your camera bag if outdoors (to keep it from blowing in the wind).
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't level the tripod consistently.
customer_reviews.text: The mount didn't sit straight when in the level position. Had a slight lean towards the hinge. I could reposition the legs to get it level at that particular direction, but as soon as I swiveled the camera around it was then off by double the lean due to the correction in one direction.
customer_reviews.author: CS Smith

customer_reviews.title: Please save your money and get a better tripod.
customer_reviews.text: So I guess if you are on a budget this is ok. But for Long term, please do yourself a favor and save your money and buy the more expensive tripod. This tripod looks and feels like the $15 one a Walmart. I was expecting more metal type parts but not mostly plastic. And by the wake Amazon will send you a free gift if you right a review on this product after you ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m an amateur photographer and needed a good travel tripod as my other one was slightly too ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m an amateur photographer and needed a good travel tripod as my other one was slightly too big for lugging around. This does the job and I believe would hold its own against other tripods three times it’s price that’s more a brand name. If you’re one that wants a solid tripod and doesn’t need one of the higher-end name brand tripods, you would be happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I received this tri-pod about 4 days ago after ordering it and an extra adapter for the base. I've mounted my Canon EOS and my Leupold spotting scope on it, to see how stable the tripod remained. So far, two thumbs up! It's a very stable platform for both my camera and spotting scope. Am looking forward to using it on my next hunt. After that, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: BowHunter60

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat this tripod for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is extremely solid. Everything locks down tight and pictures look great. I love how small it folds up, it straps to the side of my camera bag with no issues at all. I definitely recommend this tripod to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera Tripod. A must for the avid photographer and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tripod. Easy to use vary stable even with a heavy 300mm lense on my camera. I like the rubber feet too, they adjust easily to an uneven surface and are great on wood floors. Also, exceptional value. Highly recommend if you need a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Da Brit

customer_reviews.title: Less Quality than the Price Suggests
customer_reviews.text: Main complaint: The legs get jammed all the time. Even though the tripod is padded and stable, the legs and knobs are clunky and unreliable. At this price range, get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Damen Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great value on sturdy tripod
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mount a small spotting scope. It is very sturdy when fully extended and has a smooth pan and tilt. Both can be adjusted to allow slow, fine movement. It packs up quickly with the quick detach baseplate. It’s also easy to adjust for uneven surfaces and includes a small bubble level. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly stable, it helped adding a weight on the bottom hook. I used my backpack and it worked great to stabilize it more! Overall it’s a very nice tripod especially for the price. Beats my old Sunpak ($35) by miles. Legs were stiff to remove the first few times but loosened up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Travel Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this on a few hiking photo trips in the mountains and as far as I'm concerned this is the best travel tripod I've ever owned. It holds up all my travel lenses no problem. It is super lightweight with solid stability and sturdiness. You won't find better for this price. The only thing wrong with it was the detachable plate was a bit wonky so I used one from another tripod I had and it quickly fixed the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Perullo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tripod
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would take a chance on a tripod that was less than $40. I wasn't expecting much but was I surprised. This thing is great. My camera attaches firmly to the mount and it is very sturdy. I have no worries that my camera will fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Curley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a very durable stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd camera tripod stands. I needed an extra one for traveling. It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only had about 2 weeks. This light weight tri pod great for shooting stills and self portraits is everything I hoped for and price seems right. The ONLY reason I gave it four stars is the sticking factor. When angling the tripod up or down it tends to stick a bit. I may try some Wd40 and see if it fixes the small issue. If it does, I'll edit my review. Other wise, great purchase. Also love that the price includes a carrying bag. Great feature. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for pro/heavier cameras
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my Canon 5d mark iv. It does not hold the weight of the camera without making the camera fall forward. It doesn't hold it upright. You have to lean it slightly backwards to have any chance of it holding the camera up which is a problem when trying to shoot straight on.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Namini

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy for the money. I have been using this for several months and it works wonderfully. I have used this tripod outdoors from level to rough terrain and it works great. I am so happy with this product I have made a second purchase of it.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very very useful! I shot many video by this tripod
customer_reviews.text: Very very useful! I shot many video by this tripod, very pleasant experience, easy to carry, easy to fold/unfold, streach to almost any direction. Nowadays, I literally put it in my trunk to everywhere I go. Not necessary t mount camera, it can be cellphone, I am happy about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Stable Tripod!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tripod to hold up my DSLR while taking long-term exposures. This tripod holds up well. It has a nice leveling guide to ensure proper level. The legs are easy to extend and retract. And hooking up the DSLR is easy as pie. Highly satisfied with this purchase and would recommend this tripod to others who want stability while being easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Rene M. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice tripod for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with a Nikon P900 I got for Christmas. I added a lens ring mount to move the center of balance forward on the camera since this camera is very forward heavy of the tripod mount on the camera body. The tripod is mostly plastic but seems to be well built and of good quality. It's very light which is what I wanted, and you can hang weight on the center hook to steady it. All in all a very good value for the money spent. Hopefully it will last a couple years with proper care.
customer_reviews.author: dave schulte

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice size fits into my case
customer_reviews.text: Just got seems very nice , it’s smaller than my normal one that’s a plus , it’s a bit heavier but i like that too . Feels good unfolds easily, i like it we’ll see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: sking

customer_reviews.title: This tripod was recommended to me by a friend
customer_reviews.text: Five Stars! This tripod was recommended to me by a friend, and it works great! I use it for my Youtube channel @Weston Dohse. My favorite parts is how it is so light, and comes with a carrying bag, and how easy it is to use. I also like hot the feet are on a ball joint. I recommend this product for YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Teigen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it does
customer_reviews.text: I settled for this tripod after comparing it with others on Amazon, and I'm pretty happy with the results. For the price, it is a sturdy, lightweight, and overall useful addition to my photography gear. It extends far beyond what I need, and has neat little parts like a backpack hanger. Does exactly what I need it to do and more, for a very fair price. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sev

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is excellent!!! It's sturdy but lightweight and offers multiple height options. I also love the bag that it comes in, as you can carry the tripod easily. It has a great design and for the price, I'm so glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: C D

customer_reviews.title: Budget tripod lightweight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unfold and fold back Light weight but sturdy enough for DSLR. Comes with attachment phone. removable attachment plate has small rubber notch not sure what it is for. Happy with budget tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka

customer_reviews.title: Way better than other collapsible tripods.
customer_reviews.text: Way better than other collapsible tripods. Still reasonably priced, but doesn't wobble and hold up my rather heavy SLR without the problem of the tripod collapsing under the weight. It fits into my carryon luggage and is always "ready to go"
customer_reviews.author: Mike in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great Tripod for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this tripod to photograph work events and i am extremely happy with the quality of this product! It is sturdy, light weight and easy to set up/break down. I've only used it twice so far but i would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alli G

customer_reviews.title: ZOMEI 55"  Nice tripod
customer_reviews.text: Recently I purchased my first video camera. I needed a good tripod for it. I settled on the ZOMEI 55" because of build quality, cost and features. There are cheaper ones on the market but, you know what they say? You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tripod. It is light and easy to set up the quality is good for a tripod in this price range. The only thing I wish the crank to raise and lower the camera operated a bit smoother. But all in all it’s a great Tripp’s if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid easy to setup tripod
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tripod to use with a spotting scope and was quite pleased with it when I received it. The adjustments work well and it seemed to be very sturdy for a light weight tripod. The locks for the legs work very nice and get a firm grip yet are easy to release. This should work well for my application.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is great and for the price you can't go wrong. It's very durable and very steady which is what i really was looking for in a tripod. We took it out in the snow to get some pictures and it is very easy to use and light weight! Great product, just what we were looking for:)
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a value! You would be hard pressed to find a tripod cheaper than this one that also checks all of the boxes. This things is light, sleek, inexpensive, and extremely sturdy. Comes with a nice travel bag that you can easily put into. I extended the hight to it's max, and it maintained a very solid/sturdy posture. I have nothing but good things to say about this. This is a perfect tripod for anyone from beginner to advanced photographer.
customer_reviews.author: GOAT1856

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but upon inspection, the tripod is built with quality materials for a fraction of the price of those more expensive brands. I like how it came with a storage bag for easy portability. I would definitely recommend this to those looking to purchase a tripod for their cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I love this tripod. Very light and easy to transport with the included travel bag. The tripod is very sturdy and comes with a compass to get the tripod level. I have used the tripod for family vacation pictures and to get feedback on my golf swing( not pretty). I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: madhat1953

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tripod based on the reviews and because my old tripod broke (the "pitch" knob broke). This one seems much sturdier, taller and with better adjustments and control. Filmed kid's 2nd-grade performance and passed the muster when all the actors loved the footage.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tripod
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tripod for my Canon SL2. It is compact and sturdy and at 2lbs its easy to carry around. The ball socket feet are handy for uneven surfaces on a cruise ship and while hiking.
customer_reviews.author: SuperArtsy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this tripod! Super lightweight and easy to use! Can extend to three different heights and turn for a vertical view from the camera. I especially liked that it comes with its own carrying case! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and stable. Legs collapse and extend easily and stay locked in place. Lots of plastic parts make me worried they’re not going to last long. I’m happy with my purchase, and am definitely looking forward to using this great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter tripod. Lightweight and not bulky and simple to setup. Decide to purchase so I could get some long exposure shots. Check out my images on Instagram at “sharoninnj” Recommend for anyone looking for relatively inexpensive tripod wanting to get acquainted with digital photography.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact. Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great Tripod for the price! I wanted a more compact and portable tripod because I strap it to the outside of my camera backpack and mostly photograph outdoors in nature. This is the third Tripod I have gone through and my favorite for sure
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy them.
customer_reviews.text: To flimsy even a moderate breeze causes movement. I got them to use with 20x binoculars(which they were advertised to pair well with) totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: stable and light BUT..............
customer_reviews.text: the little mounting plate i got was broken so may have to order a new plate to test WITH camera but otherwise seem nice
customer_reviews.author: daniel evans

customer_reviews.title: better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had a much more expensive tripod for my professional camera that someone else took on vacation forgetting I had a shoot that night. I bought this expecting it wouldn't last through one shoot with the weight of the camera and lens. I've started using this tripod more than my other just because it's easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a pro-level tripod by any means, but one that is lightweight and packs small enough to fit onto your carry-on luggage. More solid than the lightweight Amazon-branded tripods.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Compact, light and easy to to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I was looking for. Compact enough to fit into my backpack and lightweight and easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great portable tripod especially for the cost. Has served me well around the world and survived international flights with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great for amateur video and photography.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for amateur photographers. Works great with smaller devices, I would not trust it with heavier tech. It is lightweight, but that also makes it less sturdy. I think it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Portable Folding SLR Camera Tripod !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Portable Folding SLR Camera Tripod. I have been looking for a Tripod for my digital camera which has good quality and reasonable price. I liked this tripod. This is very lightweight and portable. I am able to adjust the height easily. Also, It holds my camera very good. I use this for creating my training tutorials. I am enjoying this.
customer_reviews.author: BayArea Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod
customer_reviews.text: Used this for three hour photo shoots this weekend and last. Easy to figure out, easy to detach at reattach my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Initial Review
customer_reviews.text: Definitely seems to be a good built tripod. Haven't fully used it but for a few shots on my Canon Rebel T7. It can hold the wait of the camera especially vertically which I was very hesitant at first but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Extremely light weight, the carrying case w/ strap is so helpful - we do a lot of hunting and fishing and hiking around so this makes it less of a hassle to bring a tripod. Super easy to set up. Definitely worth the price, I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: The tripod is not too heavy and seems to be fairly sturdy, although I have only used it a few ...
customer_reviews.text: There were issues with delivery, but Amazon and the company resolved them quickly. The tripod is not too heavy and seems to be fairly sturdy, although I have only used it a few times so far. It works as expected. It is versatile in terms of height and adjust-ability.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: great deal price vs quality
customer_reviews.text: i have used this tripod few times so far and was stable, holds my D7200 without any issues and most important of all it's stable. would recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Yazzan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Light weight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy and stable. It comes with a carry case and is light weight. I like it. Excited to use it on my travel adventures. Came fast and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Namita Soni

customer_reviews.title: MUST GET!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tripod for my vacation and boy did this tripod surprise me! I had a cheaper amazon one that was super flimsy but this one has all the bells and whistles without breaking the bank! Sturdy and awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Quality But However!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s all black material and is really easy to use except the screw, it toke me a few hours to figure out how to attach it to my camera. You have to detach it from the stand and screw it on the camera by a Nob that is under the hood. Other than that it’s really good for the price honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Mochasister

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: So far we have been very pleased with this tripod. We used it for family beach pictures and top hold a spotting scope. For the price is has been a great purchase and lived up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Osborn Family

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I lost the mounting plate on my first trip and these guys replaced the part for free. Not their fault, tripod snagged on trees in some thick brush of the Oregon rainforest I was in and fell off and was lost. Need more companies like these.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ralstin

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: I got my item today. I love this product. Great design and quality. I feel wonderful about this product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Htoo Gay

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tripod and bought a second month's later. Collapse just fine to fit in my case. I may have to but another for my daughter to have with her equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beefy at the right places!
customer_reviews.text: Extra sized control knobs and hardware, even with a central lock for when the legs are not fully spread. I use heavy Nikons on this and am super pleased I can easily carry on my backpack. great design for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Vicars

customer_reviews.title: More heavy-duty then expected! 5/5
customer_reviews.text: More heavy-duty then expected. Great quality on the aluminum and plastic. Excellent adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Love this tripod
customer_reviews.text: Love this tripod! Eventually the height adjustment handle snapped but the seller quickly replaced the unit. What a great company with lightning fast customer support. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL DESIGN, STURDY AND PROFESSIONAL LOOK
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that if you are looking for a nice tripod, look no further, this is great
customer_reviews.author: VNNUS

customer_reviews.title: A Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Cumbersome to use. Lightweight but jittery on the head. Head motion hard to manipulate. I thought I had spent enough to enjoy this travel tripod vs cheaper versions. Not for my tastes. Willing to pay the return fee to hold out for something I enjoy using. I wanted to like this tripod.
customer_reviews.author: ConscientiousConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s light and comes with a carrying case that I clipped easily to my backpack. Does the job great.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: I like that its sturdy made Its holds a nightvision monocular perfectly With a y adapter, i fired a 30/30, and a crossbow off it.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Beginner photographer, which it would go up higher but very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Semaj

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with this tripod
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this tripod. I use it to tape my son’s youth soccer games using an iPad. For $5 more it’s much better than the cheaper tripod I was using before. Works for what I need it for. Love the hook to hang my purse and add wait for stability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Junky

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, no issues and for the price, I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an "economy" tripod but much better quality than the one I had prior to it. It's pretty sturdy, well built, doesn't seem "cheap" and works well for my purposes. Will probably work great for the average amateur photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TRIPOD!
customer_reviews.text: I use this often, and I can't imagine a better portable tripod for any amount! Sure, there are better tripods, but they are huge, and heavy! This one is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tripod for my cooking videos. This one can be adjusted at many angles and has worked very well. The phone holder is perfect for my S10+. Its sturdy and height can be easily adjusted. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, compact, well built
customer_reviews.text: The device is quite sturdy and features a good combination of metal and quality plastic components. It has some thoughtful features including a handcrank for adjusting the height of the camera mount, a carrying hook, and padded foam grips on all three legs. It also features socketed rubber feet. The quick release dock has a good amount of surface area to allow confident mounting of a large camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED - I received a message from their customer service, specifically Cherry. She was so awesome with helping me out to replace my faulty tripod. As of right now, I haven’t had any problems with the new tripod but I have to applaud their awesome customer service. - I have a Canon 80D and it fell on the floor last night because the top piece doesn’t snap in securely enough. I can remove my camera from the tripod when it’s suppose to be “locked” in. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a small cheap camera
customer_reviews.text: Okay for a small cheap camera however I wouldn't put any weight on it because the plastic part at the top that mounts to the camera will come out of the locking mechanism and your camera will hit the ground
customer_reviews.author: Tow truck guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use. The hand crank is a little weird.
customer_reviews.text: I like how light it is and how easy it is to set up. When I use the hand crank the camera drops back down a bit. Kinda weak. With that said I would not use this tripod for my heavy spotting scope. Its also bit short for me and I'm a taller guy. Overall its nice. I do believe after some acclamation i'll have no quarrels with this tripod.
customer_reviews.author: YoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, very sturdy and very easy to set up. I use it in the gym to video basketball games with my Samsung tablet. Had to purchase a tablet holder, but it was very easy to install it. Overall excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Feature Set - Lots of Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Well thought-out features at a great cost. The great cost will, I think, be at the expense of long-life since it uses so much plastic in it’s construction but a good buy for a beginning photog or videographer.
customer_reviews.author: Elk Whistle

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed Upon Opening
customer_reviews.text: Received my tripod tonight and as soon as the package was opened there was a broken piece. Currently debating whether or not to return for a new one or just return it all together. Not the best first impression and we were very excited to give it a try based on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam and Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product, at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This tripod does everything that I need it to do. From multiple adjustments, to easy mounting, I would purchase this product again and recommend it to all of my coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the experience
customer_reviews.text: Really handy and sturdy. Like the quality of the finish and the overall look. Worth the money. Love the extra quick release plate..
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, great product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, great product. It’s light, came with bags, able to extend three time on the feet with locks. Able to rotate vertical and hozontial, it also have a handle and leveler on the side to make sure it’s straight.
customer_reviews.author: J Wen

product_meta.title: JOILCAN 65”Compact Light Weight Travel Portable Aluminum Camera/Phone Tripod for DSLR Camera with Universal Phone Mount & Carry Case（Black）
product_meta.description:
24 hours customer service are always ready to help!
2 Years free replacement warranty for manufacturer's defects!
Please contact us if you need any help.

Tripod Technical Details
Maximum height column: 165cm / 65 in
Folded Length: 50cm / 19.5in 
Net weight: 1.18kg / 2.6 lbs 
Leg sections: 4
Material: Aluminum alloy leg and environmental protection ABS plastic

Package Size: 50*10*10cm/ 19.7"*4"*4"
Quick Release Plate:Yes 
Bubble Level: Yes 

Package Includes
1 x Joilcan Tripod
1 x Tripod Carry Case
1 x Universal Phone Mount
1 x Quick release plate

Note: Camera NOT included.
Note:
1.For camera with telephoto zoom lens, you need to buy a tripod mount ring additionally for better balance.
2.This tripod could not converted to monopod.
feature_bullets: MAIN FEATUR：Fully extended the tripod itself stands approximately 65’’ high; Measures 19.5inches. Supports up to 11 lbs; Weighs just 2.6 lbs. The feet of the legs are self-adjusting, so you get a very steady platform
EASILY ADJUSTABLE: Aluminum alloy legs which include three flip locks for adjusting the size of each leg, which works great outdoor on uneven surfaces
LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE: Ultra-Compact tripod made of lightweight material, lightweight and portable multi-functional, multi-directional tripod; Weighs just 2.6 lbs, perfect for packing around

STABILITY: The center column also has a hook to hang weight on to lower the center of gravity on this tripod to make it more sturdy and less prone to vibrations which is awesome for photography where you take long exposures

What You Get -A bonus phone mount, a bonus carry bag and Extra quick release plate.We provide you with a two-years worry-free warranty, and you can rest assured to buy a tripod! If you encounter any problems during use, please contact us, we will reply to your message within 24 hours and solve the problem for you

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars717 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
